name: Fan game Silent Hill Metamorphoses
description:
The main character of the game, Eve Coulman, goes to Silent Hill looking for her missing brother.  Arriving at the place, the girl is surprised at the snowfall in early May, and having met several bizarre characters on her way, she realizes that something strange is happening to the town.

The game is made in the format of a visual novel and offers:

- an original storyline within the mythology of the series. That being said, some familiar characters will return as a small cameo;

- linear narrative with two endings;

- a visual in the spirit of the original Silent Hill and Play Novel games;

- classic Silent Hill gameplay with exploring locations, solving puzzles and a simple turn-based combat system;

- return of some monsters that were not included in the release version of the first Silent Hill as enemies and bosses.

Recommended:

- play the game in the dark and with headphones for maximum atmosphere;

- save often;

- thoroughly examine the premises for ammunition and medicines;

Tip: Using certain items during some battles can help you defeat the enemy faster.
